page.title: 03THRESHELFORD'S FARM
page.content: Mr. Bonner is the man who owns the farm.Threshelfords farm has been a seed farm for a hundred years.The farm used to be 1800 acres.Now it is 200 acres.Mr. Moss owned the farm when there were 1800 long. Two thirds of the farm is used for seed.The other third is used for'Pick your own'.About 100 years ago a railway called 'The crab and winkle'ran through Threshelfords farm to pick up seeds. They have blackcurrants, wheat, barley, rape, rye gass for seed, strawberries, raspberries, gooseberries, flowers for seed, tomato, borage,sweet corn, willow (grown for cricket bats) and broccoli.
